description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Fish Cakes With Warm Asian Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tuna Fish Cakes With Warm Asian Salad
name: Tuna Fish Cakes With Warm Asian Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook carrots and broccolini stems in simmering water for 2 minutes. Add remaining broccolini and snow peas and cook a further 1 minute. Drain and return to pan. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over vegetables. Serve tuna cakes with vegetable salad.
